review: great addition to our home video set up
author: Gordon Crow, Jr.

review: I purchased this to watch hulu and hbonow on my tv. The hulu playback stutters constantly and although hbogo is supported, hbo now is not. The interface is quick and easy to navigate, but lacks any customization options.
author: kenneth chatman

review: I wasn't sure that I would like it better than my current Roku, but now I am sure. This Fire TV Stick is great! The on screen screen setup instructions were easy to understand, although it's easy enough to setup without them. It's more responsive than the Roku. The UI only took me a day or two to get accustomed to as well. Great product! I'll be purchasing more to swap out my remaining Roku boxes!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not really sure why I waited to purchase the Fire TV Stick, and I had high expectations of this product so for it to exceed those expectations is unexpected.  Usually I wait a few months to make a review as a few days or weeks isn't enough time to test out a purchase, however in this case I'm extremely pleased with my purchase and expect you will be too.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's a great product idea,but it freezes it heats up and it won't even work at all at times. Other than that when it does work it's good. Everything you do want to watch you have to purchase movies,games,apps, and very little free good stuff.
author: mommyknowsbest

review: Love this worked great easy to install now I can watch Netflicks etc. ChromCast wouldn't work but the Fire Stick did and it's wonderful.
author: Nora D McNeal

review: This is a cunning device!  It operates smoothly and quickly; very slick.  And there is so much free content available with amazon prime.  I know some folks bought these early on and paid about $15, but it is well-worth the full price of $39.
author: Matthew A. Jewell

review: The user interface is good, but it disconnects from the internet often. I have barely been able to get through more than 15 minutes of watching a show, and the network settings tell me the connection is "excellent".
author: Carly

review: Simply put, my Chromecast sits in a drawer unused. My Fire TV Stick is attached to my TV and used all the time.
